MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  G31 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Gallowgate and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.57am.  Our engineers have arrived on site at the Comelypark Street substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.13am on Thursday 7th January 2021.
